messages.message:
Hi All, anyone has objections to me deleting the instabase-dogfood-002 cluster?  We ran into unwarranted issues due to it.  And, now that our overall wordpress health is good, I think we can go ahead and delete it.

cc @kunal @Ashish
Kunal, we should do a export/import from production to dogfood to make sure that they are in sync before we take 002 down.

Also, from a Baunfire point of view, we need to inform them that the domain will change from dogfood-002.instabase.com (http://dogfood-002.instabase.com) (002 cluster) to dogfood.instabase.com (http://dogfood.instabase.com)
